Uses of Class
com.ojcoleman.bain.base.ConfigurableComponentCollection

  • Packages that use ConfigurableComponentCollection 
    Package Description
    com.ojcoleman.bain.base
    Contains the base classes from which most of the components of a neural network are built on or extend from.
    com.ojcoleman.bain.neuron.rate  
    com.ojcoleman.bain.neuron.spiking  
    com.ojcoleman.bain.synapse.rate  
    com.ojcoleman.bain.synapse.spiking  

    • Uses of ConfigurableComponentCollection in com.ojcoleman.bain.base

      Subclasses of ConfigurableComponentCollection in com.ojcoleman.bain.base 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  NeuronCollection<C extends NeuronConfiguration>
      Base class for all collections of neurons.
      class  SynapseCollection<C extends SynapseConfiguration>
      Base class for all synapse collections.

    • Uses of ConfigurableComponentCollection in com.ojcoleman.bain.neuron.rate

      Subclasses of ConfigurableComponentCollection in com.ojcoleman.bain.neuron.rate 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ClampedLinearNeuronCollection
      Implements neurons that pass through received input, but chop-off values below 0 or above 1.
      class  LinearNeuronCollection
      Implements neurons that simply pass through received input.
      class  NeuronCollectionWithBias<C extends NeuronConfiguration>
      A base for (typically rate-based encoding type) neurons that include a bias in the activation.
      class  RisiModulatoryNeuronCollection<C extends RisiModulatoryNeuronConfiguration>
      Implements the neuron model described by S.
      class  SigmoidBipolarNeuronCollection<C extends SigmoidNeuronConfiguration>
      Implements rate-based neurons that use a bipolar Sigmoidal activation function.
      class  SigmoidNeuronCollection
      Implements rate-based neurons that use a Sigmoidal activation function.
      class  SoltoggioModulatoryNeuronCollection<C extends SoltoggioModulatoryNeuronConfiguration>
      Implements the neuron model described by A.

    • Uses of ConfigurableComponentCollection in com.ojcoleman.bain.neuron.spiking

      Subclasses of ConfigurableComponentCollection in com.ojcoleman.bain.neuron.spiking 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  FixedFrequencyNeuronCollection
      A collection of neurons that produce spikes at a fixed frequency.
      class  FixedProtocolNeuronCollection
      A that produces pre-determined spike patterns.

    • Uses of ConfigurableComponentCollection in com.ojcoleman.bain.synapse.rate

      Subclasses of ConfigurableComponentCollection in com.ojcoleman.bain.synapse.rate 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  FixedSynapseCollection
      Implements synapses with a fixed efficacy (weight).
      class  Niv2002SynapseCollection<C extends Niv2002SynapseConfiguration>
      Implements the plastic synapse model described by Niv et al (2002) Evolution of reinforcement learning in uncertain environments: A simple explanation for complex foraging behaviors.
      class  RisiModulatorySynapseCollection
      Implements the plastic synapse model described by S.
      class  SoltoggioModulatorySynapseCollection
      Implements the plastic synapse model described by A.

    • Uses of ConfigurableComponentCollection in com.ojcoleman.bain.synapse.spiking

      Subclasses of ConfigurableComponentCollection in com.ojcoleman.bain.synapse.spiking 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Clopath2010SynapseCollection
      Implementation of the model described by Clopath et al.: "Connectivity reflects coding: a model of voltage-based STDP with homeostasis", (2010).
      class  Graupner2012SimplifiedSynapseCollection
      A simplified implementation of the model described by Graupner, M., Brunel, N.: Calcium-Based Plasticity Model Explains Sensitivity of Synaptic Changes to Spike Pattern, Rate, and Dendritic Location.
      class  Graupner2012SynapseCollection
      Implementation of the model described by Graupner, M., Brunel, N.: Calcium-Based Plasticity Model Explains Sensitivity of Synaptic Changes to Spike Pattern, Rate, and Dendritic Location.
      class  Pfister2006SynapseCollection
      Implementation of the model described by Pfister, J.-P., Gerstner, W.: Triplets of Spikes in a Model of Spike Timing-Dependent Plasticity.
